about_the_game:
This is a Steam version of a hit visual novel game released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc. It is a collection of romantic, richly illustrated interactive stories with the following premise:

On a whim, the heroine ends up in a fake marriage to a man she's just met. The two move in together and play at wedded bliss, but spending each day together brings them inevitably closer. What was once just pretend starts to feel real...
Enjoy the will-they-won't-they excitement of newlywed life that begins with a lie in My Forged Wedding!

An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.

The Story:
"Marry me... Only a month would do."

Due to a twist of fate, you're now pretending to be the wife of a man you've just met. At first, you're against the idea of this fake marriage, but as the days go on and you get to know one another, your mutual attraction deepens...

Characters:
Yamato Kougami "Physics teacher"
Takamasa Saeki "Author"
Ren Shibasaki "Scientist"
Takao Maruyama "Lawyer"
Yuta Kajima "Comedian"


Contents:
Includes "Main Stories" in the App "Love 365: Find Your Story."
Follows Yamato, Saeki, Ren, and Takao's stories up to "Honeymoon: Epilogue."
Stories for Yuta are included up until "Wedding Bells: Epilogue."

content_descriptors.notes: Some stories may contain scenes of a sexual nature not suitable for all ages.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
